about_the_game:
Welcome to Magnum Opus

This is a non commercial online RPG designed for people looking to roleplay on its purest form. The world is a sandbox with lots of premade characters you can choose from, there are no set objectives or scripted quests.

You can choose to be all sorts of different characters, including characters that would be unplayable NPCs in other games, you can even roleplay as the final boss in a dungeon.

For example you could be a giant, a wild animal, a demon, a farm animal, a knight, an angel or a legendary hero.

The game is designed to support up to 2700 different character archetypes, each with their own backstory and abilities. Of course populating the game with such a large character roster will take time, which is why the game is currently on Alpha stage and only accesible to Alpha testers.

In Magnum Opus the world is a stage and the players are the actors!
